translations: v.调整结构，改组；重组（困难企业的债务）

phrs.translation: 改组, 重组, 更改结构, 重构
企业重组, 要内容的企业重构, 公司重构
重组职级, 更改职级结构
气道重建, 气道重修
文件重构, 文件改组

sentences.sentence: The president called on educators and politicians to help him restructure American education.
sentences.translation: 该总统号召教育家和政治家们帮助他重新建构美国的教育。

sentences.sentence: Since technology has such an insatiable appetite for eating up human jobs, this phenomenon will continue to restructure our economy in ways we cannot immediately foresee.
sentences.translation: 由于技术在吞噬人类工作方面非常“贪得无厌”，所以这一现象将会继续以短时间难以预料的方式重构我们的经济。

sentences.sentence: The operations can be quite involved, requiring many procedures in order to restructure the anatomy.
sentences.translation: 手术可能会十分复杂，需要许多步骤来重建结构。
